ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate whether or not drug accountability was done performed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DASTAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. May be used to derive a value into the SDTMIG variable DASTAT. If DAPERF = "N", the value of DASTAT will be "NOT DONE". If DAPERF = "Y", DASTAT should be null. A combination of SDTMIG variables ( e.g., DACAT and DASCAT, DATPT ) is used to indicate that multiple tests were not done. In this situation, the SDTMIG variable DATESTCD would be populated as DAALL and an appropriate test name (DATEST) provided. See SDTMIG Section 4.1.5.1.2.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This may be implemented on a CRF page level on a visit-by-visit basis. General prompt question to be used as a data management tool to verify that missing results are confirmed missing.
